item.title: Stremio + Real-Debrid
item.description: Breakdown and explanation of Read-Debrid and Stremio at the bottom. Step 1: Real Debrid Real Debrid is what is used to provide media to torrentio in Stremio. Go to Real-Debrid Make an account and buy the service. Step 2: Stremio Download Stremio for your device and set it up by running the installer. Once installed, visit this link to install torrentio: https://torrentio.strem.fun/configure Don’t worry about any of the fields except for Debrid Provider.

item.title: Sideloading
item.description: Sideloading Sideloading is the iOS equivalent of installing APK’s on Android. It allows for “sideloading” apps that are not available on the app store. There are way to do this for free involving using a VPN to block Apple’s servers but the easiest and most reliable method is to buy a certificate. Buying a Cert These cert’s last for a year and then another must be bought Shops Explore the r/sideloaded subreddit to see what shops are currently recommended as these change often.

item.title: Tools and Websites
item.description: Some useful tools and websites. Torrents qbittorrent: The best and most commonly recommended. It is open source and light weight Transmission and Deluge are other open source torrent clients that are recommended VPN Mullvad: The best privacy respecting VPN however it does not support port forwarding protonVPN: Best privacy respecting VPN for torrenting as it does support port forwarding airVPN: Another good VPN for torrenting with port forwarding Browser Extensions uBlock Origin: The best ad-blocker out there.
